org.deeplearning4j.scaleout.actor.core.actor

Class MasterActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • org.deeplearning4j.scaleout.actor.core.actor.MasterActor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor, DeepLearningConfigurable

    public class MasterActor
extends akka.actor.UntypedActor
implements DeepLearningConfigurable
    Handles a number of workers and acts as a parameter server for iterative reduce
